entry.title: In The Middle Of The Night, When The Wolves Come Out
entry.summary:
Author: Blahblahblahblah9

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,095Chapters: 3/12Kudos: 87

Summary: Stiles' life is turned upside down when his best friend turns into a werewolf over night. Dealing with the little wolf situation is hard enough, add in a feral alpha out for blood and a smoldering hot guy that makes him lose his train of thought every time he looks at him, and Stiles is in for the wierdest year of his life.A retelling of season one of Teen Wolf.

entry.title: How to train your alpha werewolf
entry.summary:
Author: everyonelovesLaurence

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 48,956Chapters: 9/29Kudos: 77

Summary: Derek Hale has always known two things about himself: He's not good at making people like him, and he's going to be his sister's second for the Sacramento pack. But when a random assignment leads him to be the new alpha of Beacon Hills, dealing with far too big shoes to fill and a new pack orphan that everyone listens to far more than they do him, he thinks it's his big chance to finally prove his worth to his mother. Besides, it's not forever, is it?Stiles Stilinski has always known two things about himself, too: Being the son of the alpha is a Big Job, and it's his to do, and one day, his mate will be the next alpha of his mother's pack. But when his parents are murdered, and some growly man with expressive eyebrows unwillingly takes her place, he's got two choices: keep glaring at Derek or teach him to man up. At least until he's found a replacement. How long could that take?This is a story about building a pack, finding a home and cuddling with a dog. It's mostly about the dog.

entry.title: FAIL WITH CONSEQUENCE (TWAT)
entry.summary:
Author: knox_rivers

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,708Chapters: 2/12Kudos: 25

Summary: When Stiles undoes Scott’s werewolf bite, everything changes. Powerless and immune to the supernatural, Scott falls from the center to the fringe watching as Stiles becomes something… More. More than the boy who used to orbit someone else’s story, stepping into a role no one had a name for. Was it truly the path to becoming a True Alpha that made Scott a hero or had seeing himself as Beacon Hills paragon only amplified the illusion? *inspired by failcat's AU twitter post wherein Scott becomes human again learns he's a twat but really he learns nothing and continues to be a twat.

entry.title: Change On The Rise
entry.summary:
Author: evvrythingisawesome

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 21,698Chapters: 14/75Kudos: 21

Summary: (Teen Wolf/Stargate Crossover AU continuation)As summer draws to a close, the Littlefield pack continues their long road to recovery. Still reeling from his sister's death and resurrection, Derek returns to his quest for the truth of his lost Hale ancestor; Cora grapples with the consequences of everything that transpired over the summer, including her return from the dead; and Stiles finds new ways to balance the desires of his inner demons with the needs of his pack.

entry.title: The Creator's Game
entry.summary:
Author: Glitter_Lips

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 90,174Chapters: 25/38Kudos: 32

Summary: Everyone in my story is dead. Alec has been a Beacon Hills resident and a McCall pack member for just over a year, and he’s finally starting to feel comfortable and safe after his near death experience at the hands of Monroe and her hunter army. He doesn’t want to get involved in the war ever again, content to play lacrosse and live his life.But Monroe isn’t finished yet, and she won’t rest until all supernatural people are wiped out for good. Her plans won’t allow Alec to stay uninvolved forever, and his past threatens to catch up with him no matter how badly he had hoped to keep those secrets buried.

entry.title: call it off
entry.summary:
Author: endversed

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 104,988Chapters: 10/11Kudos: 971

Summary: “You kissed me,” Stiles says. To that, Derek says nothing. His gaze does not leave Stiles’ mouth. “But you… you’re straight,” Stiles carries on. And still, Derek says nothing. His fingers twitch harshly around his grip on thin air. “You have a girlfriend,” Stiles whispers. Derek is on his feet in an instant.  Stiles is the gay, terminally-single loser of Beacon Hills High. Derek is the straight, cheerleader-dating jock he should have been smart enough to stay away from.

entry.title: if couches could talk
entry.summary:
Author: seaweedwater

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,694Chapters: 2/5Kudos: 33

Summary: Derek watched Stiles grow into the young man he is now—smart, funny, kind, exceptional, truly gorgeous. He could easily find someone his age who would give him the time of day, but he doesn’t seem interested in a relationship, or anything that could distract him from pining for Derek’s notice.Derek would be lying if he said he didn’t like the attention. He’s careful with it, careful not to indulge him and lead him on, to take advantage, because there’s nothing that could ever happen between them. He’s a child, his son’s best friend, the son of a Sheriff who has a gun rack, and Derek is thirty-six and unhappily married with taxes to pay and a house to maintain.It’s just a fantasy, something Derek lets his mind play with since he knows nothing could ever come of it. If he imagines Stiles’ fingers inside him instead of his own, it’s not like anyone else could ever know that.

entry.title: Only Some Ties Bind
entry.summary:
Author: rororowyourboat

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,824Chapters: 6/6Kudos: 98

Summary: Stiles' maternal grandmother shows up, offering to help him learn more magic. Nobody likes the idea of Stiles going to visit his family alone, so Derek volunteers to join him, as his boyfriend.The only problem? They aren't dating.So they go, and Stiles has to navigate relatives who had shunned his mother and him his whole life, learn to control his magic better, and find a way to deal with the man he's been hopelessly crushing suddenly glued to his side.Meanwhile, Derek is feeling guilty about savoring the opportunity to glue himself to Stiles' side, trying to support his learning of magic, and mostly ignoring the meddling family members that definitely want something from Stiles, even though they don't deserve a second of his time.No big deal, right?

entry.title: Frozen Lines
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 99,626Chapters: 12/?Kudos: 63

Summary: The ice was his sanctuary. His home.But outside the rink, everything was war.Stiles carried a past full of pain—silent wounds no one could see. And Derek, the unyielding captain of the basketball team, was the last person he wanted to face.Enemies bound by pride, secrets, and unspoken grudges.In a town where trust shatters like thin ice, their collision is inevitable.Can two broken souls break down the walls between them? Or will the fight destroy everything, including what they never expected to find: each other?The ice will always be his sanctuary. But maybe, for the first time, the battle is worth fighting off the rink.

entry.title: my blood never tasted like wine
entry.summary:
Author: Melpomene (Aconitehart)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,169Chapters: 5/10Kudos: 308

Summary: Peter looks up and frowns. "I'm busy, nephew."Shit. Stiles peeks over his shoulder and, sure enough, there's Derek Hale. Dark hair, pale eyes, stubble carefully sculpted and contoured. He looks older now, more solid, with a hint of grey at his temples.  He's wearing a suit, like every other mobster werewolf in existence. Stiles stares, open-mouthed, for a moment before he realises that Derek is glaring at him. Mortified, he turns away, his heart banging against his rib cage."Ah, that's right," Peter says, lazily waving a hand. "You two are already acquainted."That's not really how Stiles would put it, but he keeps his mouth shut. He stares down at his hands, feeling Derek's gaze boring holes through him."The Stilinski kid is here looking for work?" Derek asks, sounding almost disgusted. "He's going to be dancing here?""I feel like a broken record," Stiles snaps, twisting around to look at Derek again. "For the last time, all of my clothes are staying on. I'm not going to writhe around a stripper pole to entertain a bunch of wolves. But I can mix drinks and serve cocktails, okay? That's what I want to do."

  • Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings

entry.title: Of All The Names I Gave You, My Favourite One is MINE!
entry.summary:
Author: NiklausScratchIII

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 30,592Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 151

Summary: Stiles is the new wolf in town, on the run from something he's not ready to face. Derek is a new single parent, and has no idea what he's doing, but hes doing his best dammit. A desperate moment finds the two wolves forging a unplanned bond that might just heal them both. Will their vastly different needs find a way to align, or is a neighbor wolf just a neighbor wolf at the end of the day.orDerek is drowning in single parenthood. Stiles loves babies. Derek might be ready for love even if it's not ready for him. Stiles has a dark past and big secret. And Eli...hes just a baby.

entry.title: Where Ashes Lies
entry.summary:
Author: TendreChaos

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,915Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 5

Summary: Stiles has always known there was something inside him the world learned to fear. Something that made him different.In the ashes of a fractured society where the supernatural is feared, sorcerers like him are branded as threats, locked behind iron gates, stripped of names and freedom, buried under numbers and silence. Wounded and half-starved, Stiles escapes the concrete prison that once held him and vanishes into the wild ruins beyond civilization’s reach.There, hidden in the bones of the old world, he finds a rebel enclave, scarred souls and restless fire, a flicker of resistance in a land gone cold. But trust is a fragile thing in a world built on betrayal, and Stiles carries a secret, a power he barely understands, a part of himself he cannot share.Because if they knew the truth, if they knew what he really was...They wouldn’t hate the cage he escaped from.They’d build a stronger one.
